2024-01-01.name: New Year's Day
2024-01-01.description: New Year’s Day is celebrated many countries such as in India on the January 1 in the Gregorian calendar.

2024-01-13.name: Lohri
2024-01-13.description: Lohri is a restricted holiday in India

2024-01-14.name: Makar Sankranti
2024-01-14.description: Makar Sankranti is a restricted holiday in India

2024-01-15.name: Pongal
2024-01-15.description: Many southern states in India, particularly Tamil Nadu, celebrate Pongal as a thanksgiving for the good harvest season in mid-January every year.

2024-01-17.name: Guru Govind Singh Jayanti
2024-01-17.description: Guru Gobind Singh Jayanti is the Sikh annual celebration that occurs in countries such as India around December or January in the Gregorian calendar.

2024-01-25.name: Hazarat Ali's Birthday
2024-01-25.description: Hazarat Ali's Birthday is a restricted holiday in India

2024-01-26.name: Republic Day
2024-01-26.description: India's Republic Day marks the anniversary of the adoption of the Indian constitution. It is an annual gazetted holiday in India on January 26.

2024-02-10.name: Lunar New Year
2024-02-10.description: Lunar New year is an annual global celebration in many countries including India.

2024-02-14.name: Vasant Panchami
2024-02-14.description: Vasant Panchami, or India’s spring festival, is a Hindu event that includes special rituals and highlights the start of spring.

2024-02-14.name: Valentine's Day
2024-02-14.description: Valentine’s Day is celebrated in many places worldwide, including in India, on February 14 each year.

2024-02-19.name: Shivaji Jayanti
2024-02-19.description: Shivaji Jayanti is a restricted holiday in India

2024-02-24.name: Guru Ravidas Jayanti
2024-02-24.description: Guru Ravidas Jayanti is a restricted holiday in India

2024-03-06.name: Maharishi Dayanand Saraswati Jayanti
2024-03-06.description: Maharishi Dayanand Saraswati Jayanti is a restricted holiday in India

2024-03-08.name: Maha Shivaratri/Shivaratri
2024-03-08.description: Maha Shivratri is an annual festival dedicated to Shiva, the Hindu God of destruction. For devotees, is a day of reflection and meditation.

2024-03-12.name: Ramadan Start
2024-03-12.description: Ramadan is a period of prayer, reflection and fasting for many Muslims worldwide. It is the ninth month in the Islamic calendar.

2024-03-24.name: Holika Dahana
2024-03-24.description: Holika Dahana is a restricted holiday in India

2024-03-25.name: Holi
2024-03-25.description: Holi is a spring festival of colors celebrated by Hindus, Sikhs and others. It celebrates the triumph of good over evil and the upcoming season of spring. The festival can last up to sixteen days.

2024-03-25.name: Dolyatra
2024-03-25.description: Dolyatra is a restricted holiday in India

2024-03-28.name: Maundy Thursday
2024-03-28.description: Maundy Thursday is a Christian observance on the Thursday during Holy Week. It is the day before Good Friday.

2024-03-29.name: Good Friday
2024-03-29.description: Many Christians commemorate Jesus Christ’s crucifixion and death on Good Friday. It is a gazetted holiday in India.

2024-03-31.name: Easter Day
2024-03-31.description: Easter Sunday commemorates Jesus Christ’s resurrection, according to Christian belief.

2024-04-05.name: Jamat Ul-Vida
2024-04-05.description: Jamat Ul-Vida is a restricted holiday in India

2024-04-09.name: Chaitra Sukhladi
2024-04-09.description: Chaitra Sukhladi is a restricted holiday in India

2024-04-09.name: Ugadi
2024-04-09.description: Ugadi is a restricted holiday in India

2024-04-09.name: Gudi Padwa
2024-04-09.description: Gudi Padwa is a restricted holiday in India

2024-04-10.name: Ramzan Id/Eid-ul-Fitar
2024-04-10.description: One day of Eid-ul-Fitar, which marks the end of Ramadan, is a gazetted holiday in India.

2024-04-11.name: Ramzan Id/Eid-ul-Fitar
2024-04-11.description: Eid al-Fitr is a holiday to mark the end of the Islamic month of Ramadan, during which Muslims fast during the hours of daylight.

2024-04-13.name: Vaisakhi
2024-04-13.description: Vaisakhi, also known as Baisakhi, is a harvest celebration on either April 13 or April 14 in the Gregorian calendar. It is one of India’s most notable celebrations.

2024-04-14.name: Mesadi / Vaisakhadi
2024-04-14.description: Mesadi / Vaisakhadi is a restricted holiday in India

2024-04-14.name: Ambedkar Jayanti
2024-04-14.description: Ambedkar Jayanti is a central government holiday in India

2024-04-17.name: Rama Navami
2024-04-17.description: Rama Navami is a Hindu festival that celebrates the birth of Rama, the first son of King Dasaratha of Ayodhya.

2024-04-21.name: Mahavir Jayanti
2024-04-21.description: Mahavir Jayanti is a gazetted holiday in India

2024-04-23.name: First day of Passover
2024-04-23.description: During Passover, the Jewish people remember the liberation of the Israelites from slavery, their exodus from Egypt, and that their first-born children were spared during the 10th plague, as told in the Haggadah.

2024-05-08.name: Birthday of Rabindranath
2024-05-08.description: Birthday of Rabindranath is a restricted holiday in India

2024-05-12.name: Mothers' Day
2024-05-12.description: Mother’s Day celebrates the achievements and efforts of mothers and mother figures.

2024-05-23.name: Buddha Purnima/Vesak
2024-05-23.description: Vesak, also known as Buddha Purnima, celebrates of Gautama Buddha's birth, enlightenment and death.

2024-06-16.name: Fathers' Day
2024-06-16.description: Father’s Day celebrates fatherhood and male parenting on different dates worldwide.

2024-06-17.name: Bakrid/Eid ul-Adha
2024-06-17.description: For India's more than 200 million Muslims, Bakrid, the Festival of Sacrifice, is one of the holiest days of the year.

2024-07-07.name: Rath Yatra
2024-07-07.description: Rath Yatra is a restricted holiday in India

2024-07-17.name: Muharram/Ashura
2024-07-17.description: Muharram, or the Islamic New Year, is a public holiday in India.

2024-07-21.name: Guru Purnima
2024-07-21.description: Guru Purnima is a festival that honors spiritual Gurus by remembering their life and teachings. It is observed on the full moon day, Purnima, in the Hindu month of Ashadh, which is usually June or July.

2024-08-04.name: Friendship Day
2024-08-04.description: Friendship Day is a observance in India

2024-08-15.name: Independence Day
2024-08-15.description: India's Independence Day is an annual gazetted holiday on August 15 to commemorate the day India became an independent nation.

2024-08-15.name: Parsi New Year
2024-08-15.description: Parsi New Year is a restricted holiday in India

2024-08-19.name: Raksha Bandhan (Rakhi)
2024-08-19.description: Raksha Bandhan is a Hindu festival that is celebrated on the full moon of the Hindu month of Shravana (Shravan Poornima). The day is also sometimes referred to as Brother and Sister Day because it honors the relationship between brother and sister.

2024-08-26.name: Janmashtami
2024-08-26.description: Krishna Janmashtami is a Hindu festival that celebrates the birth of Krishna, the eighth incarnation of the god Vishnu. It is celebrated on the eighth day of the Hindu month of Bhadrava (Bhadrapada), which is usually in August or September.

2024-08-26.name: Janmashtami (Smarta)
2024-08-26.description: Janmashtami (Smarta) is a observance in India

2024-09-07.name: Ganesh Chaturthi/Vinayaka Chaturthi
2024-09-07.description: Ganesh Chaturthi is the great Ganesha festival that celebrates the birthday of Lord Ganesha during the Hindu Month of Bhadra, which usually falls between mid-August and mid-September. It is also known as Vinayaka Chaturthi and can last up to 10 days.

2024-09-15.name: Onam
2024-09-15.description: Onam is a restricted holiday in India

2024-09-16.name: Milad un-Nabi/Id-e-Milad
2024-09-16.description: Milad un-Nabi is a gazetted holiday in India and marks the Prophet Muhammad's birthday.

2024-10-02.name: Mahatma Gandhi Jayanti
2024-10-02.description: Mahatma Gandhi's birthday is an annual gazetted holiday in India on October 2.

2024-10-03.name: First Day of Sharad Navratri
2024-10-03.description: First Day of Sharad Navratri is a observance and Hindu holiday in India

2024-10-09.name: First Day of Durga Puja Festivities
2024-10-09.description: First Day of Durga Puja Festivities is a observance and Hindu holiday in India

2024-10-10.name: Maha Saptami
2024-10-10.description: Maha Saptami is a restricted holiday in India

2024-10-11.name: Maha Navami
2024-10-11.description: Maha Navami is a restricted holiday in India

2024-10-11.name: Maha Ashtami
2024-10-11.description: Maha Ashtami is a restricted holiday in India

2024-10-12.name: Dussehra
2024-10-12.description: Dussehra, also known as Vijaya Dashami, is an Indian festival that celebrates good forces over evil forces. It spans for 10 days and is celebrated in varied traditions across India.

2024-10-17.name: Maharishi Valmiki Jayanti
2024-10-17.description: Maharishi Valmiki Jayanti is a restricted holiday in India

2024-10-20.name: Karaka Chaturthi (Karva Chauth)
2024-10-20.description: Karwa Chauth is an annual one-day festival that honors the Hindu god Shiva and goddess Parvati. It is celebrated by all married Hindu women on the fourth day after the full moon in the Hindu month of Kartik, which is usually in October.

2024-10-31.name: Halloween
2024-10-31.description: Halloween is a festive occasion that is celebrated in many countries on October 31 each year.

2024-10-31.name: Naraka Chaturdasi
2024-10-31.description: Naraka Chaturdasi is a restricted holiday in India

2024-10-31.name: Diwali/Deepavali
2024-10-31.description: Diwali is a festival of physical and spiritual light celebrated in October or November each year.

2024-11-02.name: Govardhan Puja
2024-11-02.description: Govardhan Puja is a restricted holiday in India

2024-11-03.name: Bhai Duj
2024-11-03.description: Bhai Duj is a Hindu festival that celebrates the relationship between a brother and a sister on the second day after the new moon in the Hindu month of Kartika.

2024-11-07.name: Chhat Puja (Pratihar Sashthi/Surya Sashthi)
2024-11-07.description: Chhat Puja (Pratihar Sashthi/Surya Sashthi) is a restricted holiday in India

2024-11-15.name: Guru Nanak Jayanti
2024-11-15.description: Guru Nanak Jayanti is a gazetted holiday in India

2024-11-24.name: Guru Tegh Bahadur's Martyrdom Day
2024-11-24.description: Guru Tegh Bahadur's Martyrdom Day is a restricted holiday in India

2024-12-24.name: Christmas Eve
2024-12-24.description: Christmas Eve is the day before Christmas Day and falls on December 24 in the Gregorian calendar.

2024-12-25.name: Christmas
2024-12-25.description: Many Christians celebrate Christmas Day, which is a gazetted holiday in India, on December 25 each year.

2024-12-26.name: First Day of Hanukkah
2024-12-26.description: Hanukkah, also known as Chanukah or the Festival of Lights, is celebrated for 8 days between the 25th day of the month of Kislev to the second day of Tevet in the Hebrew calendar.

2024-12-31.name: New Year's Eve
2024-12-31.description: New Year’s Eve is the last day of the year, December 31, in the Gregorian calendar.
